pages.text:
.entry-header
Events
Resort Events
Community Events
2025 Resort Events
Sunday Feb 9th
Super Bowl Party
Come hang out in the clubhouse to watch the big game! We will provide dips and snacks for the guests. Please bring your own drinks and sides to contribute.
Book Now
Call Now!
Friday February 14th
Valentines Day
Enjoy a small offering of cookies in the clubhouse to get your holiday weekend started!
Book Now
Call Now!
Saturday May 26th
Memorial Day
Enjoy a small offering of cookies in the clubhouse to get your holiday weekend started
Book Now
Call Now!
Friday July 4th
July 4th Ice Cream Social
Ice cream social in the clubhouse and around the benches outside of the office. Carrabelle will host its annual fireworks extravaganza on Friday, July 4th, along the Carrabelle Waterfront at dark thirty. Guests can also go to the St. George Island Independence Day Festivities.
Book Now
Call Now!
2026 Community Events
See All Local Events
February 21 - February 22 2025
Apalachicola Mardi Gras Barkus Parade & Street Festival
Apalachicola Riverfront Park
Water Street, Apalachicola, FL, United States
The Mystic Krewe of Salty Barkers will be celebrating Mardi Gras Apalach-style bigger and better than ever this year, with two days of fun.
See Event
March 22nd 2025
Panacea Beer and Oyster Festival
The Panacea Beer and Oyster Festival is held along Dickerson Bay at Woolley Park in Panacea, Florida. The festival features unlimited samplings of local and national craft beers in the beer garden and will host local oyster farmers who will have their delicious oysters available for purchase!
See Event
2025 Date TBD
Worm Gruntin' Festival
The actual worm grunting contest is held early in the morning, along with a 5K run. At noon, the live music begins and continues until late into the evening. Also included in the festivities are a horseshoe contest, a hula hoop contest, and arts and craft vendors.
See Event
April 26th 2025
St. George Island Brewfest
The SGI Brewfest is a one day festival to promote the appreciation of craft beer. This event is a fundraiser for the Franklin County Humane Society. Live music fresh beer and so much more!
See Event
October 31st and November 1st 2025
Apalachicola Seafood Festival
The Florida Seafood Festival is a two day event annually drawing tens of thousands of visitors to the historic town of Apalachicola in scenic Franklin County. The Festival is held at the mouth of the Apalachicola river under the shady oaks of Apalachicola’s Battery Park.
See Event
.entry-content .clear

The SGI Brewfest is a one day festival to promote the appreciation of craft beer. This event is a fundraiser for the Franklin County Humane Society. Live music fresh beer and so much more!
See Event
October 31st and November 1st 2025
Apalachicola Seafood Festival
The Florida Seafood Festival is a two day event annually drawing tens of thousands of visitors to the historic town of Apalachicola in scenic Franklin County. The Festival is held at the mouth of the Apalachicola river under the shady oaks of Apalachicola’s Battery Park.
